answers.answer: your dear kitty needs to see a Vet asap....this sounds very much like CRF (chronic renal failure...kidneys) OR diabetes.... she is most likely in alot of discomfort, please don't wait....these symptoms are very serious.♥

Please call the Vet and get your kitty there ASAP. If cats stop eating for even just a few days it can also upset their liver. You need to have him checked for kidney issues. The first sign is increased thirst. Don't ignore that. I just went thru this. ((hugs))~Bkitty
I'm thinking kidneys or diabetes also, especially if this is not a young cat.
